description: This file is a PHP source file that generates a web page displaying detailed network connection and modem status information for a device. It includes data retrieval from various device parameters, connection status, IP configurations, and modem diagnostics, along with HTML formatting for presentation.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Utility function to divide two numbers and return quotient and remainder as an array.

methods.name: sec2dhms
methods.description: Converts seconds into a human-readable string with days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
